question:
Your colleague is traveling from another country by plane for a meeting. You have arranged the airport pickup, hotel accommodation and planned his/her meetings. Write a letter to your colleague. In your letter,

– Say when and where you will meet him/her
– Explain where he/she will stay
– Tell him/her about the other arrangements you made.
text: I hope this letter finds you well and I am very excited to meet you soon at the YVR airport. I see that your's plane will be arrived at 9am. Since  It is Sunday we may have huge traffic. hence,  I will be waiting in the parking lot. Therefore, we can meet over there and I can also carry your baggage along with me.

As you know, Vancouver downtown is the best place in  Canada and I have booked your accommodation in the Westin hotel which is in the core downtown and very close to all required  facilities. In addition, you can have a mesmerising view from your room as I requested the hotel manager to provide the best room in the hotel.

I know you will be busy with your schedules throughout the day and I decided to  provide a good lunch at the weekend. I also ordered a brand new phone which is much needed to talk with your family and friend during your free time. When you feel alone and boring please do not hesitate to call me for the company and I am sure we can have fun together during weekends.
I cannot wait to see you anymore and I wish you all the best on your trip.
